gurmukhi: s`kRMdnqwqxI eysxI BwKIAY ] mQxI qwky AMq Sbd ko rwKIAY ] nwm qupk ky icq mY cqur pCwnIAY ] ho ibnw kpt iqn lKo n kpt pRmwnIAY ]1212]
transliteration: Sakhrandan-taataniesanibhaakheeai|| Mathanitaake Ant Shabad Ko Raakheeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Chit Mai Chatur Pachhaadeeai|| Ho Binaa Kapat Teen Lakho Na Kapat Pramaaneeai||1212||
translation: Saying the words “Sakrandan-taatani Ishani”, add the word “mathani” at the end and recognize the names of Tupak cleverly and guilessly.1212.

gurmukhi: kaUskysxI iesxI piRQm bKwn kY ] mQxI qwky AMq Sbd ko Twn kY ] skl qupk ky nwm cqur pihcwnIAY ] ho kho hmwry bcn s`iq kir mwnIAY ]1213]
transliteration: Kaooskesaniisanipritham Bakhaan Kai|| Mathaanitaake Ant Shabad Ko Thaan Kai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Paihchaaneeai|| Ho Kahe Hamdare Bachanndsatt(i) Kar(i) Maaneeai||1213||
translation: Saying the word “Kauskeshani Ishani”, add the word “mathani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak considering them as true.1213.

gurmukhi: bwsvysxI Awid Bix`jY ] AMq Sbd ArxI iqh id`jY ] nwm qupk ky sB ijX jwno ] SMk iqAwg inrSMk bKwno ]1214]
transliteration: Baasvesaniaadh Bhanijjai|| Ant Shabad Arnitih Dijjai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Jeea Jaano|| Shank Tiaag Nirshank Bakhaano||1214||
translation: Saying the words “Vaasav-Ishani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know the names of Tupak unhesitatingly.1214.

gurmukhi: brhw iesxI ArxI Awid bKwnIAY ] skl qupk ky nwm su icq mY jwnIAY ] SMk iqAwig inrSMk aucwrn kIjIAY ] ho siq su bcn mwno lIjIAY ]1215]
transliteration: Barhaa Isaniarniaadh Bakhaaneeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Su Chit Mai Jaaneeai|| Shank Teeaag(i) Neershank Uhaaran Keejeeai|| Ho Sat(i) Su Bachanndhamdare Maane Leejeeai||1215||
translation: Saying the word “Varhaaishani arini”, speak all the nnames of Tupak inn your mind and I say truly, use these names unhesitatingly.1215.

gurmukhi: mGvysxxI iesrxI piRQmY pdih aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjY su kib suDwr ]1216]
transliteration: Maghvesananiisraniprithmai Padah(i) Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejai Su Kabi Sudhaar||1216||
translation: By uttering the words “Mathveshani Ishvarni”, the names of Tupak are formed correctly.1216.

gurmukhi: mwqlysxI eysxI mQxI AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]1217]
transliteration: Maatlaasaniesanimathaniant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hai Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||1217||
translation: By uttering the words “Matuleshani Ishani Mathani”, the names of Tupak are formed, which the poet may improve.1217.

gurmukhi: ijsneysxI Awid Bix`jY ] iesxI mQxI AMq kih`jY ] sB sRI nwm qupk ky lhIAY ] dIjY qvn Tvr jh chIAY ]1218]
transliteration: Jisanesaniaadh Bhanijjai|| Isanimathaniant Kahijjai|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Laheeai|| Deejai Tavan Thavar Jah Chaheeai||1218||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Jisneshani”, add the words “Ishani mathani” at the end and know the names of Tupak for using them at the desired place.1218.

gurmukhi: piRQm purMdr iesxI Sbd bKwnIAY ] iesxI mQxI pd ko bhur pRmwnIAY ] nwm qupk ky skl jwn ijX lIjIAih ] ho SMk iqAwg inrSMk aucwrn kIjIAih ]1219]
transliteration: Pritham Prtandar Isanishabad Bakhaaneeai|| Isanimathanipad Ko Bahur Pramaaneeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Jaan Jiya Leejeeaih|| Ho Shank Tiaag Nirshank Ouchaaran Leejeeaih||1219||
translation: Saying the words “Durandar-Ishani”, add the words “Ishani mathani” and know all the names of Tupak, uttering them unhestitatingly.1219.

gurmukhi: bjRBirsxI ArxI Awid aucwrIAY ] nwm qupk ky icq mY cqur ibcwrIAY ] SMk qXwg inrSMk huie Sbd bKwnIAY ] ho iksI su kib kI kwn n mn mY AwnIAY ]1220]
transliteration: Bajrabhrisaniarniaadh Oucdareeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Chit Mai Chatur Bicdareeai|| Shank Tyaag Nirshank Hue Shabad Bakhaaneeai|| Ho Kisisu Kabi Kikaan Na Man Mai Aaneeai||1220||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Vajarbhareshani arini”, know thoughtfully the names of Tupak in your mind, use them without caring for any poet.1220.
